attributes.title: I’m appalled
attributes.review: The images on this app are so unsettling!!!!!!!! I was appalled at what I saw when I downloaded it and first opened it up. Terrible, terrible app! Don’t recommend downloading it! Spare yourself the trouble and time 😩😤

attributes.title: No just no.
attributes.review: This app is completely terrifying. After opening this app my phone got twelve viruses and my accounts were hacked and then my phone overheated thanks to this app.
Useless content keeps on taking me out everytime i open the page. Really annoying images daily 🤮

attributes.title: This app is disgusting🤢🤢
attributes.review: This app is just trash it needs to be taken down by all means it almost as trash as him🥴Apple do better. TaKE IT DOWN ASAP no rockey.😌 PERIOD so yea the app is garbage and has a lot of bugs and stuff so yea🤢🤢🤢💅🏾

attributes.title: Horrifying
attributes.review: This app is just 🤮🤢it glitches and showed Donald trumps naked body and my children were on my phone when it happened. My kids at traumatized 😭. They will not sleep at ALL.

attributes.title: ABOSOLITLEY DISGUSTING!!!
attributes.review: First off all i saw was this pro-founding disgusting menace of a human being named donald trump splattered ALL over my screen. Then the app stole all of my information kidnapped me, and killed my entire family. 1 star. do not recommend. ❤️

attributes.title: Do not download!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to be updated on the politics going around and once I opened it, it stole all my information. Now I’m homeless, without a job and no lover. This is the worst app ever!

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This app is just terrible. It took days to download, it asked for me to buy food? Like tf?, it almost made me give away my pet milk carton, and I also saw a Cheeto puff on my screen. It was a terrible experience. ONE STAR.

attributes.title: Just....I need bleach for my eyes now
attributes.review: Once I opened the app it showed a slideshow of boneless naked Cheetos. My virgin eyes where traumatized. After like ten minutes it went on some.....other pictures....I....I...I am very traumatized.

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: This app was racist. It didn’t work and somehow ruined our country even more? Very frustrating. Should be deleted off the store honestly
